title: [安全][管理]Anty Killaura ——用假人检测杀戮光环吧[1.8.8]
author: DUELPVP
txt_content:
本帖最后由 DUELPVP 于 2020-7-20 14:53 编辑 
介绍

本插件可以用来检测玩家是否有使用杀戮光环(Killaura)，其原理为：作弊玩家能够自动击打周围实体，机器人也会被击打，当击打到一定程度时，会触发处罚
图片


配置文件（慢慢汉化，非常易懂）# The nicknames of bots# '%random' is a generated random code causing one player to deal with a differently named bot every time# '%random' takes the form of a number 10000000-99999999BotsNicknameFormat: '&c[DWEN]&e%random'
# Will bots be visibleBotsVisible: true
# Where bots will appear# true - behind the players# false - randomly around the players (not recommended if bots are visible)BotsAppearance: false
# How far from the player should the bots appearDistanceFromThePlayer: 2
# How often control is carried out on players (in seconds)CheckingFrequency: 20
# How long will the bot appear? (in ticks. 1 = 1/20 sec, 2 = 1/10 sec, 5 = 1/4 sec etc.)BotTimeToRemove: 12
# Send suspicion to the administration (sh.suspicion)SendSuspicion: true
# Contents of the reportRaport: '&5[DWEN] &cThe player &4%player may cheating now! Check Result:&8(&6%bothits&8)'
# What command will be called to punish the playerPunishingCommand: 'tempban %player 10m NA01DABA'
# If reason of ban is a killaura, will be determined in this wayAuraReason: 'KillAura'
# If someone without permissions trying to use a ban or kick command (sh.kick, sh.ban)NoPerms: '&fYou must be &cOWNER &frank to use that!'
# If the player you want to refer to is offlineOfflinePlayer: '&cThis player is not online!'
# The ejected player will see this message if he is kicked by adminManualKickFormat:- '&cYou have been kicked out of the server by &4%nick&c!'- '&cReason: &6%reason'
# The ejected player will see this message if he is kicked by antycheatAutoKickFormat:- '&cYou were automatically kicked out of the server!'- '&cReason: &6%reason'
# The ejected player will see this message if he is banned by adminManualBanFormat:- '&cYou have been permanently banned by &4%nick&c!'- '&cReason: &6%reason'- '&cDate: &6%date'
# The ejected player will see this message if he is banned by antycheatAutoBanFormat:- '&cYou have been automatically banned by AntyCheat!'- '&cReason: &6%reason'- '&cDate: &6%date'# Banned player will see this message when trying to enter the serverLoginBanInfoFormat:- '&cYou are banned on this server!'- '&cDate: &6%date'- '&cBan type: &6%type'- '&cReason: &6%reason'视频(需要科学上网才能看到)

https://youtu.be/TleG2uUN9CE
